params.text:
Labeled parameters

It would be nice if Viuact supported labeled parameters. In function
definition they would be specified like this:

    (let fn (x ~y) ...)

In this function ~y is the labeled parameter. It cannot be passed
positionally (by order), but must be passed by label - like this:

    (let result (fn 4 (~y 2)))

The tilde must be used to tell Viuact that it is not a function call but
rater an argument bind expression. Labeled arguments must be passed
after positional ones, but may be passed in any order. For example:

    (let fn (a ~b ~c) ...)

    (let result (fn 0 (~c 2) (~b 1)))

Pretty useful, if you'd ask me.
